name: canva_search_templates
description: Search for design templates on Canva. Returns up to 15 results with template name, category, dimensions, creator, and URL.

steps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="template"] a[href*="/templates/"], [class*="card"] a[href*="/templates/"], a[class*="TemplateCard"]'); if (items.length === 0) { const altItems = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="grid"] > div, [class*="results"] > div'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(altItems.length, 15); i++) { const el = altItems[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('[class*="title"], h3, h4, [aria-label]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/templates/"], a[href*="/design/"]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); results.push({ title: titleEl ? (titleEl.getAttribute('aria-label') || titleEl.textContent.trim()) : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '' }); } } else { for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 15); i++) { const el = items[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('[class*="title"], h3, h4, [aria-label]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); const categoryEl = el.querySelector('[class*="category"], [class*="type"]'); const proEl = el.querySelector('[class*="pro"], [class*="premium"]'); results.push({ title: titleEl ? (titleEl.getAttribute('aria-label') || titleEl.textContent.trim()) : (el.getAttribute('aria-label') || ''), category: categoryEl ? categoryEl.textContent.trim() : '', is_premium: !!proEl, url: el.href || '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '' }); } } return { query: `{{query}}`, result_count: results.length, results: results }
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract template results
